favourite.article: Oh, Lord! Santify us today, purify us right now. Please wash all my natural life away, and all my self You wash away too. Please reconstitute my being with Your divine element that I will become a new creation. Oh Lord, do work on me today. Amen!
Oh Lord purify us by speaking in our heart. Thank You Lord for touching us, for washing our feet. We love You Lord, Amen.
O Lord, do work on us today! To form the church Your glorious way. Oh, spread Yourself in us Till we are glorious; Oh, make us glorious, Lord, today. Amen
These signs shall follow them that believe, Lord Your Word is yes and Amen.
O Lord do work on us today! To form the church Your glorious way.
Thank You Lord for all You do!
Indeed we need the Lord's inner work for the glory of the church. Lord work on today.
You can really use each of these stanzas to pray back to The Lord. "Lord Jesus do sanctify, purify, nourish, cherish, and work on us today for Your heart's desire!"
